question: The Vijay Stambh of Chittorgarh was built to commemorate the victory of Rana Kumbha in which among the following battles?
explanation: The Battle of Sarangpur was fought between Rana Kumbha and Sultan Mahmud Khilji. It was fought in 1437 C.E.Rana Kumbha built the Vijay Stambh of Chittorgarh to commerate the victory.
